    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10502</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Interactive Quiz - Economic Awareness</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario interactivo – Conocimientos económicos</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist Idirghníomhach – Feasacht Eacnamaíoch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktiver Quiz - Ökonomisches Bewußtsein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu Interactif - Conscience Économique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Interativo - Consciência Econômica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Interattivo - Consapevolezza Economica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων - οικονομική 
συνειδητοποίηση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will test their understanding of important economic concepts.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes comprobarán su comprensión sobre importantes conceptos económicos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálfaidh daltaí a dtuiscint ar choincheapa tábhachtach eacnamaíocha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios empresariales</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéir Ghnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer prüfen ihr Verständnis der 
wichtigen ökonomischen Konzepte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants testeront leur arrangement des 
concepts économiques importants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes testarão sua compreensão de 
conceitos econômicos importantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi verificheranno la loro comprensione 
dei concetti economici importanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν την κατανόηση σημαντικών 
οικονομικών εννοιών τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études d'Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Do Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Di Affari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχειρησιακές μελέτες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
